headline: Did Salesforce’s (CRM) Small AI Revenue Base and Higher API Costs Just Recast Its Margin Story?
summary: In early January 2026, Salesforce’s latest updates on its AI products, particularly Agentforce and Data 360, highlighted strong interest but underscored that these offerings still contribute less than 3.5% of total revenue, leaving questions about their current financial weight. The company’s push to raise API and integration costs while acquiring AI marketing firm Qualified has sharpened the debate over whether Salesforce’s AI ambitions can enhance margins without alienating customers or...

headline: Is Salesforce (CRM) Still Attractive After A Mixed Year Of Share Price Moves
summary: If you are wondering whether Salesforce at around US$262.90 is a bargain or already pricing in big expectations, you are not alone. The stock is roughly flat over the last month with a 0.9% return, up 3.7% year to date, but still shows an 18.6% decline over the past year after a strong 80.5% gain over three years and 23.5% over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Salesforce's role as a major software player and its ongoing push to refine its product suite and customer offerings...
